name: Real Music Store Audio File
summary: Learn about .RAX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Other similar Real Audio file extensions are .RA and .RAM.
NOTE: The RAX format is no longer supported by RealNetworks RealPlayer.

description: Audio file purchased from the Real Music Store and played by Real Player, an audio and video streaming and playback program; stored in a proprietary format with DRM protection; can be converted to more popular file formats, such as .MP3.
